segments.text: How have you been feeling lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ Ve been feeling a little light-headed lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has your blood pressure been high before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I have high blood pressure , it is news to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually people with high blood pressure have no symptoms , so we call it the silent killer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you use to check for high blood pressure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to put a cuff on you to get a reading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does the reading tell you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I get an idea of the pressure in your arteries when your heart is pumping blood versus at rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope that the test results show me to be really healthy .
segments.speaker: S2
